text: Barbara Krafftówna, Barbara Krafft-Seidner (5 December 1928 – 23 January 2022) was a Polish actress. She appeared in more than 40 movies and television shows between 1953 and 2020. She was born in Warsaw, Poland. She was known for her roles in Tonight a City Will Die (1961), How to Be Loved (1963), The Saragossa Manuscript (1965) and The Codes (1966). Krafftówna died in Skolimow, Poland on 23 January 2022, at the age of 93.Nie żyje Barbara Krafftówna ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Polish television actors Category:Polish stage actors Category:People from Warsaw
title: Barbara Krafftówna
